description:
"I just graduated from grad school," Rick told us. "I haven't started working yet."
I met Rick through a friend of a friend and the timing couldn't have been better. He had a few weeks on his hands before starting his new job.

"I like Latin women," he said. "I like more of a round ass. I like to touch it, rub it a little bit, maybe a few kisses. And then fuck it in the end!"
Speaking of asses, I noticed that during the first part of his video, Rick was rubbing his asshole lightly and it really seemed to get him off.
After dumping his first load, I asked Rick about going one step further and actually putting his finger
his ass.
"Nah, man," he said nonchalantly. "That's a line I don't want to cross."
I'll never understand that one aspect of the heterosexual male. Why are they so hung up on their assholes?
But hey, it really seemed to get him off, so it's all good!
I was, however, able to get him to taste his own cum!
title: Rick
